__e: Agreed, but you can't even give chase to me as if you were a man and me a woman.
It would be different if I was a man, but I'm only a girl.
You know, if I were a man, none of this would be a big deal.
If it wasn't a six-hour drive, I'd consider getting a place here.
It never crossed your mind that maybe it wasn't an accident?
You know, if I were a man, none of this would be a big deal.
I can't believe that's who came after me.
If I were the kind of woman to say "I told you so,"
I feel like It's just... It's kind of like that's the past, and I'm not in that space anymore.
I didn't think I was that good, but I suppose I was.
I thought your past wouldn't be as bad as the others'.
I had no idea it was so important to our history.
Was it so I would go to school where you wanted? !
Why didn't you tell her to go to the police?
I don't know what I would do if my dad were in prison.
I feel as if I were only going to see you about five minutes more all the rest of my Iife.
Look, I know it seems like it's out of nowhere, but it's not.
I think if I were to do it - and I don't think I ever would... But you never know.
If it were up to me, I'd totally do it, though.
I would say that if it weren't... For my father... I'd be dead right now.
But if it is because of me, maybe I can talk her out of it.
Well if it were up to me I wouldn't be here at all.
None of this would have happened if it wasn't for me.
D'you know what, he wouldn't even be here if it wasn't for me!
Well, none of this would've happened if it wasn't for you, so...
All I know is that none of this would have happened if he hadn't of gotten that letter.
You and your friend, - if not for you, I wouldn't— - No need.
Let me talk to him for you. It'll be better if it's man-to-man.
I know you said you didn't want it to be a big deal but it is to me, so... I wanted it to be that way to you too.
It's like there's an answer to all of this, I know... I know it's right there, right in front of me, but I can't... see and I can't...
